Package com.flipfit.bean

Class GymCentre

java.lang.Object
com.flipfit.bean.GymCentre
public class GymCentre extends Object
The GymCentre class represents a gym center managed by a gym owner in the FlipFit application. It holds details about the gym, including its location, capacity, and approval status.
Author:

  • Constructor Details

    • GymCentre

      public GymCentre()

    • GymCentre

      public GymCentre(int centreId, int ownerId, String centreName, String slots, int capacity, int cost, boolean approved, String city, String state, String pincode, String facilities)
      Constructs a new GymCentre object with all details. This constructor is used when retrieving a gym center record from the database.
      Parameters:
      centreId - The unique ID of the gym center.
      ownerId - The ID of the owner.
      centreName - The name of the gym.
      slots - The slots available at the gym.
      capacity - The capacity of the gym.
      cost - The cost of a slot.
      approved - The approval status.
      city - The city of the gym.
      state - The state of the gym.
      pincode - The pincode of the gym's location.
      facilities - The list of facilities.

    • GymCentre

      public GymCentre(int ownerId, String centreName, String slots, int capacity, int cost, boolean approved, String city, String state, String pincode, String facilities)
      Constructs a new GymCentre object for a new gym that does not yet have a generated ID. This constructor is typically used before a gym is saved to the database for the first time.
      Parameters:
      ownerId - The ID of the owner.
      centreName - The name of the gym.
      slots - The slots available at the gym.
      capacity - The capacity of the gym.
      cost - The cost of a slot.
      approved - The approval status.
      city - The city of the gym.
      state - The state of the gym.
      pincode - The pincode of the gym's location.
      facilities - The list of facilities.
